item.description:
Hello Bookcrossers! I hope to see you at our regularly-scheduled monthly meetup. Come and talk books with other book-loving people. We are a friendly and welcoming group. New members are always welcome!

SPECIAL: Kate from D.C. (one of the head book crossers in the D.C. area) will be in town and would love to meet Boston book crossers. We look forward to hosting her and discussing the bookcrossing scene in D.C. with her.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us on the second floor at the back. We'll be the group with many stacks of books.
item.name: The Boston Bookcrossing Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
